title: Picking grapes
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Jack Keane
brief_description: Shot close to the Murry river. Predominantly features instructional sequences on how to pick and process grapes. Nice shots featuring contrasting Orange and Green colours in the soil/grapes. Four soundtracks accompany picture; Italian, German, English and Hungarian.
